articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Doc™
Another huge move for a @developer_dao member. Jeez, so many big moves by heavy hitters.
MardΞni (🧱, 🚀) 📍🇦🇪: Career Update!!
I'm so excited to share that I've joined @weave_db as a CEO! 🧬
I will be responsible for overseeing the company's strategic direction, building and maintaining relationships with key partners and developers, and driving growth and innovation!
👇🧵
articles.title: RT Doc™: Another huge move for a @developer_dao member. Jeez, so many big moves by heavy hitters.

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Doc™
One of the greatest resources I've come across in the Web3 Space is @developer_dao.
When you've got massive talents like @dabit3, @camiinthisthang, and so many others in the DAO, you know great things are happening within.
Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): On D_D YouTube channel there is a lot of knowledge to be found! 🤓
Do you still remember the third workshop on fundraising made by D_D Fundraising Operators @mr_cgc & @Wikist_? 👀
Present Your Path to Sustainability and Scale
If you missed it:
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z0xqty_fvJg

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
🚨 P21: Simplifying Governance
In summary, this proposal:
- Speeds up Governance (15 > 10 days)
- Reduces threshold for members to elevate proposals to Snapshot (50k > 25k $CODE)
Please exercise your Gov rights and cast your votes 🙏🏼 https://buff.ly/3W4gBU8

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Wesley ✈️
Following @Rahatcodes' example, I'll give away my $CODE allocation
✨ a total of 4 @developer_dao memberships 
(I'll double the 800 tokens I got from the airdrop)
Similar rules as Rahat 👀
- NO DMs
- Reply what you're working on and how you think D_D can help
- winners by EOY
rahat.eth: In December I am going to personally give away 10 @developer_dao memberships using my $Code token allocation. 
One way to get into Developer DAO is by owning 400 $Code Tokens. See thread below on how to enter, make sure you actually read through everything.
